alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 5:32PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Box Butte, Scotts Bluff, northwestern Kimball, northwestern Morrill, Banner, southwestern Dawes, southeastern Sioux, southeastern Goshen and northeastern Laramie Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 532 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Box Butte Campground to 9 miles southeast of Albin. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hemingford around 540 PM MDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include McGrew and Melbeta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; Goshen County
